price: But they were succeeded by generations who neglected prayer and pursued their desires; so they will meet their doom[16],
arabic: ۞ فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ خَلۡفٌ أَضَاعُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّبَعُواْ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَلۡقَوۡنَ غَيًّا
footnotes: [16] i.e., a valley in Hell or the consequence of their evil deeds.
